1.content:
Beltheon is a world ruled by tribes of boys who roam the landscape, hunting for other tribes and the tiny boys who live near them. These tribes are based on family ties, each boy is born from the roots of a special trees that litter the planet. When a boy is born he is collected by the local tribe and raised as their own, when a boy reaches 16, he returns to a tree and is taken back into nature and a new boy is born.The boys are armed with spears, traps, bows and arrows and hunt in packs.

The nature of the terrain allows for a variety of predators and prey to live on this world. there exists a small species of rat that stands 1 foot tall and has a tough, almost uneatable meat which the tribes find disgusting. The tribes found that the flesh of boys was much easier to catch, and much better tasting and easier to eat thatn the rat meat, this caused the move to cannibalism in the boy population. Only the tiny boys can eat the rats, they are omnivorous, they eat mostly plants and shrubs on the forest floor, but will eat the rats if they can catch one, they are very fast. The only other top predator is the Jackel's Hawk, a massive flying reptile that catches the small rats and has developed a taste for the flesh of boys.

Each tribe can be told apart by the color of their hair and the age of the boys in the tribe, they are fierce and fearless in their quest for food. they catch their prey with chasing it down, spearing it, shooting it with arrows, setting traps and they cooked their victims over fires.

Which tribe will you follow?

(Hair color)
1.title: Beltheon Boys

11.content:
The Blonde haired tribe, a very proud and noble tribe of boys. They have roamed the planet since the beginning. They are experts at the bow and arrow, trained since birth to use them to deadly effect. This tribe hunt on the open plains, or on the edges of the forest, where the arrows are most effective.

Members:
Jacob: Leader, head of the tribe and dominates the tribal society
Keith: Second in command and is famed in the tribe as the best archer
Daniel: Tribe member
George: Tribe member
Vince: Cook
Luke: Gutter
Sam: Weaver

How old are is their leader, Jacob?
11.title: Blonde

choices: Does Jacob decide to kill the boy anyway?
Does Jacob decide to free the boy and make him a slave to the Blond Tribe?
112.content:
Keith sat in perfect stillness. His perch, on the upper most branches of a large oak, gave him a perfect view of the pond. It was unusual for such a young boy to be the second in command. He was seven, but he’d been born with a natural affinity for the bow. The first time he’d knocked an arrow back and shot, he struck the target dead on.

It was said that the boy had never missed. Sharp, ash grey eyes studied the calm pond. He didn’t fidget. That iron control was the second reason he’d risen so quickly. Keith might not be able to take one of the older boys in an open fight, but he was patience personified, and boys who crossed him often suffered at a later date for their transgressions.

The underbrush swayed. Keith’s eyes narrowed. His lips twitched into a fierce smile when the large, Black haired boy stepped boldly out into the field. The Blacks were brutish boys, dangerous, but only if one was stupid enough to get within their reach. Their fearless nature also made them stupid. Easy pickings for the Blonds whose long range weapons protected them from the need to engage the Blacks in close combat.

Keith waited until the large boy, one of the largest he’d ever seen, knelt next to the pond and began to drink. Bringing his lips together, Keith gave a shrill whistle. The Black’s head jerked up, and his dark eyes searched for the source of the noise.

In an instant, the right eye exploded. A neatly feathered shaft had bloomed in its place. The large boy lurched to his feet, stumbled, and fell into the water. “Che,” Keith grunted before he shimmied down the tree. The water would ruin the fletching of his arrow. He prided himself on the ability to make a kill without damaging his prized arrows.

“Keith! Couldn’t you make him fall the other way?” Luke whined.

“No.”

The deadpan answer made Luke roll his eyes. He trotted over to the pond and waded in to drag the corpse out. Water sloshed around him, and he couldn’t keep his nose from wrinkling at the wet stink of the Black. With a loud groan, the gangly boy managed to drag their meal onto dry land. A stone knife, Luke’s prized possession, made short work of the Black’s loin cloth. He gave a low whistle when he got a good look at the boy Keith had managed to bag.

“Not bad, this one’ll feed us for a week!” Luke crowed as he plunged the knife deep into the midsection of the dead boy. It didn’t take long for him to clean out the carcass, he set the intestines aside. Sam would use those later to create more bow strings for the hunters. When he was finished preparing the body, Daniel and George tied it to a long branch and together the boys carried their prize back to camp.

Luke and Keith brought up the rear, with Luke carrying the offal. “Why don’t you carry some of this?”

“Because I made the kill.” Keith said fastidiously. The other boy’s liked to tease him about the fact that he despised handling the body after he’d made a kill. He preferred dealing with it only after it had been cooked.

Luke snorted, but didn’t say anything. He knew his place, and the fact that he couldn’t shoot a bow to save his life guaranteed that the little archer would always be above him in the clan. The brat made well over half the kills, and Luke wasn’t stupid enough to attack the boy.

That night, the entire clan feasted. The Black had been very near his returning time, and his thick muscular body insured that all the boys had more than their fill. After they ate as much as they could, there were still several pounds of meat that was smoked for later consumption.

With full bellies, the boys stretched out on the cool grass to sleep.

Jacob woke a few hours later, his bladder full and in need of attention. After he relieved himself, he headed back to camp, only to stop when he heard a muffled whimper. He followed the sound deeper into the woods while keeping a wary eye on the trees above. It wouldn’t do to be captured by one of the Browns.

The bushes thrashed next to him, but the soft cry of pain assured Jacob that it wasn’t a trap. He pushed the bush aside and stared in surprise at the naked white haired boy. One pale foot had been caught in a Brown snare, and the little boy hadn’t been able to remove it. The child saw him and froze, huge liquid green eyes locked on his face.

It was clear that the boy was newly born. The Blonds had driven the White haired boys out of their territory, and so they weren’t here to gather up this new arrival. Jacob was still almost painfully full from their earlier feast, so he didn’t feel the urge to kill the boy for food. Instead he looked the small one over, pondering what he should do.

12.content:
The brown haired tribe lived deep in the forests, experts in the use of traps to catch their prey. in the forests is the greatest concentration of tiny boys, living in hollows of trees and in burrows. The brown hairs live in the treetops, in small huts they make out of leaves and branches. These boys are famed for their ability to leap from tree to tree and only ever going to the forest floor to set traps and collect their food. They are also the smallest of the tribes, with only 5 members.

Members:
Brad: Leader, head of the tribe
Larry: Second in command
Rob: Trap Master
Gerard: Cook
Jake: Gutter

How old is Brad, their leader?
12.title: Brown

choices: Does Rob kill his clan brother?
Is Rob killed by the tribe?
124.content:
Tiny, bead black eyes glittered with grim determination. The four man team had been assembled from the smallest of the small boys for one purpose. To strike back at the giants who routinely trapped and killed their kin.

Gib’s grip slipped, and Niro lurched sharply to the left, trying to catch hold of his comrade before he fell. Fingers tickled against Niro’s palm, and were gone. Thump, the sound was soft, unimportant. It could have been a pine cone dropping, and not a life cut short. Gib didn’t scream. Even in death he gave his teammates the best chance they would get by not alerting the Browns of the impending attack.

The three continued upward. They knew when they’d accepted the mission that it was suicide. Even at the risk of death, all four had chosen to accept. They had all lost close friends to the Browns, and it was time to show the large boys that they weren’t going just food.

Jalil gritted his teeth and continued the upward climb. They had been chosen for their miniscule size. Under the cloak of night, the Smalls climbed into forbidden territory.

Loud snores drew the tiny boys. Like dark spiders they crept over branches and sleeping boys, hunting for a specific one. Dak bit his tongue hard enough to bleed when one of the boys rolled unexpectedly, pinning him under a heavy arm. Agony ripped through the Little when his legs snapped under the pressure.

Dark eyes locked on Dak, and he gave a sharp nod. Blood dripped between his clenched teeth when Niro approached.

“Go in peace brother.” The words were so faint that only the broken boy heard them. Dak swallowed and tilted his head back, exposing his throat to Niro’s rose thorn knife. Niro’s hand reached out and pressed a hand over his friend’s mouth. The blade plunged down, slashing a fatal line across Dak’s neck. He continued muffling Dak’s final cries until the body stopped convulsing.

Jalil gave Dak an approving nod while motioning him towards one of the woven hammocks. Both tiny boys stared at the sleeping Brown for a long time. The large boy had a scar bisecting his left cheek, one that all the Littles were familiar with. This boy was the trap maker.

The two boys inched forward, each untied a small pouch form their belts as they climbed stealthily onto the big boy’s chest. Slow, careful steps lead them up to the Brown’s face and in unison they dumped the dust just under the large boy’s nose.

Pain shot though Rob’s sleeping mind. He woke with a shout, one hand flailing at his face. Niro cried out when the hand swatted him right off. Blood shot eyes opened at the sound, and with a snarl, Rob grabbed Jalil around the middle and squeezed.

With his dying breath, Jalil cursed the Brown.

Furious pain tore into Rob’s head and maddened his senses. He smashed the Little against the trunk of the tree again and again as wild, unnatural rage pulsed behind his eyes.

The dust of the Klawakii Seeds was known to induce temporary madness. It had taken the Littles seven seasons to gather enough seeds for this one attack.

With a wounded beast roar, Rob threw the broken body to the side and leapt at the boy sleeping nearest him.

13.content:
The black haired boys live in the forests too, they have no weapons, they rely solely on their brute strength to make a kill. They are built much stronger and heavier than the other tribes as they have developed advanced tactics of stealth and ambush hunting. They surround the boy and then attack, forcing the boy to the ground before making the kill. They live on the forest floor and hollow out trees to make their shelters, and the only thing they fear, are the tree dwelling boys and others of their kind.

Members:
Harry: Leader, head of the tribe
Joel: Second in command
Nathan: Hunter
Frank: Hunter
Dave: Hunter
Mike: Cook
Bob: Gutter

How old is Harry, their leader?
13.title: Black

choices: You let him talk you into mercy.
133.content:
Being sixteen, you were much bigger than many of the other boys in the forest, especially considering your training in the black haired tribes has made you even bigger than you'd normally be! While the other boys had their fancy tools, you just had your wits, your power, and your strength. Admittedly, this sort of lifestyle is very difficult, and many black tribe boys end up getting hunted down and cooked before they're very old. Those that are tough enough to survive, though, are some of the most feared boys around! Especially yourself. Today, you were out hunting on your own, always preferring to get your hands on your very own meals, as a form of recreation.

With your stealthiness, you'd already laid eyes on just about the perfect target. You were completely naked, using green berry juice as camouflage on your skin as you crept through the bushes up toward your target; a six year old boy, from the blonde tribe. No doubt a very young and inexperienced warrior, he was foolishly just skipped rocks all by himself, his bow and arrow just lying down beside him. You lick your lips, admiring his form as you crept up behind him on all fours, already salivating. You've always thought much younger boys tasted the absolute best, and this one just looked scrumptious!

Suddenly... you pounced like a lion! "Aaah!" He lets out a startled cry as he's dazed by the blow, suddenly pinned beneath you!

You roll him over, only for him to whimper as he looks up into your eyes! "Haha! I got you!" You smiled, licking your lips, making it very clear what you had planned!

He wriggled and squirmed as you grabbed at the waistband of his loincloth, just making it even easier to pull it off and leave your meal completely naked beneath you. "W-wait! What are you doing?" He whimpered.

You smile, manhandling him beneath you and feeling the curves of his body. He was so cute... so soft... it made your stomach growl! "What does it look like I'm doing? I'm hunting!" You smile, leaning forward and giving him a lick along the cheek. "And I think I've found a lovely little snack right here~!"

"No! Y-you can't!" He begs, fearing for his life now, realizing the mistake he's made. "I'm... not tasty!"
133.title: Fine Meal

choices: Have some more fun with him
1331.content:
"I don't know what you're talking about. All of you little blonde boys look super tasty to me," you giggle, letting your hands slide all up and along his scrumptious little body, feeling him all up while you pin him down beneath you. "Especially your cute little feets!" You slide down, taking his little feet in his hands. He shivered as you started to lick over his soles, savoring the incredible flavor, suckling on his toes as you felt them wriggle in your mouth. You just wanted to gobble him up right there!

"P-please, mister!" He just pleaded pitifully. "I d-don't wanna die..."

You chuckle, looking up at him. "Well, sorry, but I'm gonna have to kill you. Unless you want me to eat you while you're still alive!"

With that, you go right back to nibbling playfully on his toes, swishing them around in your mouth. Realizing his situation, the blonde boy starts to wriggle all around! "N-no!" He pleads. "Just let me go!"

"Don't be so selfish!" You roll your eyes. "I caught you fair and square, so I get to eat you!" With that, you decide to roll him over, going for his second tastiest part now; his plump little butt! He shudders as your tongue travels up and along those cheeks, gently nibbling on and squishing them in your mouth as you soak up his flavor, delighting at how cute and yummy he was. "Mmm... soo yummy~"

"Sniff... I wanna go home...!" He just cried, wriggling all the while.

"That's what they all say~" You laugh.
1331.title: No Remorse!

choices: Does the white haired boy escape?
Does someone rescue the white haired boy?
135.content:
Harry’s dark bulk moved with silent grace through the forest underbrush. A soft hoot from the left altered his course, causing him to circle back. He couldn’t see Nathan or Frank, they were ranging ahead, driving the prey deeper into the shadowed woods. Joel’s eyes caught his, and the tall dark haired boy nodded.

The two shifted again. They hunkered down on either side of the game trail, moving with the cold economy of boys who hunted often together. Harry and his second in command made a devastating killing team, and any boy foolish enough to enter their territory, save those wretched tree dwelling monkeys, was doomed.

Panic heavy feet thudded down the path, followed by the more nimble steps of the Black tribe hunters. Dave gave a blood curdling yawl. A savage grin bloomed on Harry’s lips at the sound. His heavy body tensed in preparation, large fists clenched and relaxed, eager for the upcoming kill.

A white haired boy broke through a tangle of low hanging branches, his gaze turned away from the trail ahead, staring in horror at the black haired boys gaining on him.

With a roar, Harry leapt onto the trail, directly into the white hair’s path.

The boy, slender compared to the thick built black hairs, squealed in terror and skidded to a stop. He gave another shrill cry when rock cut deeply into his bare foot.

Joel bellowed with laughter as he leapt out of hiding and reached out to grab the terrified boy.

14.content:
These boys are very rare nowadays, having been hunted by the other tribes and driven from their homes on the plains. They now have to make a living out of the hills and edges of the forest where no one goes. This tribe one of the smaller tribes and therefore relies more on their abilities with the spear to be able to hunt. This tribe contains 6 members, and is very powerful as they have developed a new method of hunting, on horseback. The horse was found by these boys on their migration to the mountains. Riding the horses gave their small numbers greater killing power.

Members:
Lee: Leader, head of the tribe
Trent: Second in command
Richard: Horse Master
Allen: Hunter
Terry: Cook
Jack: Gutter

How old is Lee, their leader?
14.title: White

choices: Does Trent talk Lee out of the plan?
Do the boys agree to the hunt?
143.content:
The aroma of cooking flesh made Lee’s stomach cramp in hunger, but he didn’t look up from the spear head he was chipping. They’d been forced out of their ancestral home by the Blonds, and the two Littles they’d managed to catch wouldn’t be enough to feed the tribe. One of the six horses nickered, and he had to repress the urge to attack.

No, the horses were a boon, and they couldn’t throw that advantage away by eating the beasts. They’d come across the horses while fleeing from the relentless assault of the Blonds, and that advantage saved the few members of the tribe that survived.

“The Littles aren’t enough, not now. We got to carve out a new homeland, and we can’t be starving while we do it.” Lee’s voice cut though the chatter of the other boys easily.

“What can we do? None of the other tribes live near here, and we can’t go back to the plains, even with the horses.” Richard said as he itched a bug bite on his chest.

A blood thirsty grin carved itself on Lee’s face. “We’re going after the Grey.”

Silence met the declaration. No one hunted the Grey, the giant boys were as deadly to the rest of the tribes as they were to the Littles. It just wasn’t the natural order of things. Leaning over, Lee pulled out a long hank of rope that he’d scrounged from the body of a Brown they’d eaten three days back.

“We’ll use the horses, on horseback, we can outrun the Grey, when he chases us, we’ll lead him into a trap of our own. Me, Trent, and Allen will be the bait. We’ll lead the Grey we saw yesterday down the northern trail, to that spot were the trail narrows, Richard and Jack will be waiting. Pull the rope tight just after we pass and the Grey will go down. Then we’ll all turn and attack his head. Our spears are strong enough to pierce a Grey’s eyes, and once he’s blind, he’s ours.”

15.content:
The grey haired boys are the fabled giant boys. they grow up to 20 feet tall and live the most nomadic of lifestyles, roaming the plains, forests, hills and beaches of the planet. They prey on the smaller boys for food and have no need for weapon, they use their shear size to overwhelm their prey. Due to their massive size, they rely mostly on speed, they can reach speeds upwards of 35 kilometers per hour, fast enough to outrun the normal sized boys. They are also the only tribe not to cook their meat, they eat their boys raw.

Members:
Cole: Leader, head of the tribe
Logan: Second in command
Garry: Hunter
Neil: Hunter
Miles: Hunter
Tim: Hunter

How old is Cole, their leader?
15.title: Grey

151.content:
The small head popped like a grape between Logan’s teeth. He chomped the body reflexively, hardly noticing the juicy taste as he stared balefully at Cole’s wide back. Cole was the leader, and had been for the past two years. Bone crunched between his teeth, and the large boy thought about the injustice of that fact. His left ankle twinged with remembered pain, of how the limb had been damaged when Cole took the tribe from him.

Blood trickled down his chin, and he growled low in his throat. The only reason Cole hadn’t killed him back then was that Garry was still loyal to Logan, and if Cole had killed him, the large quiet boy would have sought retaliation. Even though Logan hadn’t won that battle, he’d done enough damage to Cole, that Garry could have destroyed him. Perhaps the only reason that hadn’t happened was Garry’s silent nature.

Garry was the largest of the boys, and by rights would have been the leader, he simply didn’t have the personality to match his brawn. He’d been born a follower, and Cole knew the danger in killing such a powerful follower’s leader. So Logan had been given a reprieve, and was still strong enough to maintain a grim hold on the second position, but he never forgot that he’d once lead.

He flexed his ankle, testing its range of movement and bared his teeth in a bloody grin when it moved smoothly. The time had come for him to retake his thrown.

With a bellow, Logan threw himself at Cole’s back. The large boy twisted instantly at the warning sound, and caught Logan’s doubled up fists to the top of his back, instead of the back of his head, like Logan intended. A roar of pain echoed though the plains, calling the rest of the Grey’s in. Both large boys began grappling, huge fists slammed into each other as they fought a nasty battle for supremacy.

None of the other tribe members interfered, instead they watched, hooting and shouting for their preferred leader as saliva filled their mouths. This battle wouldn’t end in a draw, they knew, tonight the tribe would feast.

1511.content:
Trees groaned and shattered while the giant boys crashed through the landscape in a savage brawl. The momentum came to a bone jarring halt with Cole on top. His massive, meaty fist slammed repeatedly into Logan’s face. With a furious roar, Logan’s left hand closed around one of the unbroken trees. He grunted in a mix of pain and strain as he tore the trunk free. He slammed Cole’s head with the impromptu club with enough force that the tree shattered, driving the large boy off his chest.

Blood gushed into Cole’s eyes, blinding him and staining the ground below them in a wash of crimson. Logan took advantage of Cole’s sunned state, and body slammed him into the ground. His massive foot came down like a bolt of lightning, shattering ribs with the force.

Cole screamed, agony tore through him, and with it fear. The wound was a devastating one. He could feel his breath become strained as shards of bone pressed with lethal force against his left lung. He refused to be overthrown so easily. It was no longer a fight to maintain his position as the Leader of the Grey tribe. Now, it was simply to take the bastard down with him.

Gathering the last of his strength, Cole struck in a final deadly rush. The massive boys came together in savage embrace. The sound of their collision rolled over the land like captive thunder. Cole’s teeth came down, aiming for the tender flesh of Logan’s neck. The challenger jerked to the side to avoid the bite, but didn’t escape unscathed. Teeth locked into the thick muscle of his shoulder.

Logan grunted, and slammed his fist into the side of Cole’s head but the other boy refused to let go. He held on with grim determination, teeth gnawing at the flesh in impotent fury. With a snarl, Logan brought his hands up and drove his thumbs into Cole’s eyes, popping the orbs with terrible ease.

The teeth ripped free of Logan’s flesh when Cole reared back. He crashed to the ground and squealed in mindless agony. The fight come to an end.

Like piranha scenting blood in the water, the tribe fell on the screaming boy. Garry reached Cole first, and without preamble he grabbed the wailing boy’s left leg and twisted. The shrieks intensified to an ear splitting pitch that was accented by the sound of shattering bone. Satisfaction colored Garry’s broad face as he tore the leg free at the knee.

Neil and Miles both took hold of Cole’s arms, and played a vicious game of tug of war. A wet tearing sound marked the end of the game as the left arm gave under the pressure. Cole’s screams were diminishing as blood gushed from the wounds. Before he breathed his last, Logan knelt beside him. His strong fingers began to dig into the tender flesh just under the dying boy’s ribcage. Slowly, it gave way under his sharp nails. A savage grin blazed across Logan’s face as his hand plunged into Cole’s still living flesh, digging, searching, and finding his goal. His massive fingers closed over the still throbbing heart.

Dark satisfaction sang through his blood when he pulled the organ free. Logan held the heart above his head and gave a victorious battle cry. The rest of the tribe stopped their frenzied feasting to echo the call. Logan brought the heart to his lips and sank his teeth deeply into the ripe flesh.

The feast continued deep into the night as the huge boys gorged on the flesh of one of their own. It was rare to feel truly full, a regular boy was little more than a snack, so a feast like this was enjoyed by all. Blood, like gaudy paint, decorated the faces, arms and chests of the gathered boys.

Now that his hunger had been fulfilled, a new hunger kindled, sparked by the battle. Logan’s smoldering gaze fell on Garry, and the other boy read the heated message in them. Without a word, Logan stood and headed away from the feast, deeper into the dark night.
1511.title: Will Logan win?

152.content: The boys of the giant tribe are 13 years old and are looking for a meal. Who are they hunting?

info.brief_description: A world where cannibalism is the norm
info.description:
Boys rule the strange world of Beltheon. On this world, it resembles earth in every aspect, except that the only humans that live there are boys aged between 5 and 16. Sure a setting forced the boys to adopt tribal status and each tribe of boys had to fend for themselves. Since they lived on the move, never really settling down, they lived a hunting and gathering food. The only food the boys could hunt was other tribes of boys. There is also a race of smaller boys, ranging from 1 inch to 2 feet tall, they are the only other food source for the boy tribes.However there is a strange race of giant boys, standing 20 feet tall and roaming the landscape for food.
The leader of each tribe is the eldest in the tribe, and therefore carries the experience of the tribe. The second in command has to be at least one year younger than the leader, so that they can raise and train the new boys coming into the tribe.

Warning: Contains cannibalism, the slaughter and consumption of human flesh, if this disturbs you, leave now

Rules: NO GIRLS
No shrinking, the only tiny boys are already tiny
The boy's can be eaten raw, but it is advised to be cooked, both normal and tiny boys.

Any questions or problems, message me
